content: lion brand pattern # 30213 *cwe-tamoshanter pdf* published in knit it skill level intermediate level 3 wool-ease® article #620 2 balls crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm special stitches flat knot stitch cluster stitch hat top is worked in flat knot stitch resembles an octagon in shape band is added in cluster stitch hat is finished with picot edge and flower *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns *
